caseTitle: News Item Published in Daily Express Tribune, Partner of International Herald Tribune, on 14.03.2012 under the following Caption "Misappropriation:- Govt. withdrew Millions from Intelligence Bureau's Account
tagline: The Court, in the action taken on a news item captioned “Misappropriation: Government withdrew Millions from Intelligence Bureau’s Account”, seeks comprehensive fresh reply from DG IB and directs Mr. Tariq A. Lodhi, former DG IB, to appear in person on the next date of hearing.
